file.name: apidoc.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: FootyPhi
  description: An API serving statistically processed footballsdata from the 5 top football leauges in europe from - England, France, Germany, Spain and Italu. Defenders, midfielders and forwards have specific rankings but also general statistics easily available.The api is primarly serving eascouting.com with relevant rankings.


  version: '0.1'
servers:
  - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
paths:
  /api/defenders/duels/analytics/stats:
    get:
      description: Analytic metrics for all defenders' duels
      tags:
        - Defenders
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A JSON array array of defenders' duels analytics such as mean and standard deviation
      servers:
        - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
    servers:
      - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
  /api/defenders/passes/analytics/stats:
    get:
      description: Analytic metrics for all defenders' passes
      tags:
        - Defenders
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A JSON array array of defenders' passes analytics such as mean and standard deviation
      servers:
        - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
    servers:
      - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
  /api/defenders/rankings/stats:
    get:
      description: Analytic metrics for all defenders' passes
      tags:
        - Defenders
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A JSON array array of defenders' rankings such as mean and standard deviation
      servers:
        - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
    servers:
      - url: 'http://footyphi.com'

  /api/defenders/passes/matches/stats:
    get:
      description: Analytic metrics for all defenders' passes
      tags:
        - Defenders
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A JSON array array of defenders' matches such as mean and standard deviation
      servers:
        - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
    servers:
      - url: 'http://footyphi.com'

  /api/defenders/duels/analytics:
    get:
      description: Analytic metrics for defenders' duels
      tags:
        - Defenders
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A JSON array array of defenders' duels analytics
      servers:
        - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
    servers:
      - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
  /api/defenders/duels/info:
    get:
      description: Information for defenders' duels
      tags:
        - Defenders
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A JSON array array of defenders' duels information. A player-id parameter can be added to retrive a single record.
      servers:
        - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
    servers:
      - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
  /api/defenders/passes/info:
    get:
      description: Information for defenders' passes
      tags:
        - Defenders
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A JSON array array of defenders' duels information. A player-id parameter can be added to retrive a single record.
      servers:
        - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
    servers:
      - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
  /api/midfielders/passes/info:
    get:
      description: Information for midfielders' passes
      tags:
        - Midfielders
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A JSON array array of midfielders' passes
      servers:
        - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
    servers:
      - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
  /api/midfielders/matches:
    get:
      description: Information for midfielders' matches
      tags:
        - Midfielders
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A JSON array array of midfielders' matches
      servers:
        - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
    servers:
      - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
  /api/defenders/passes/analytics:
    get:
      description: Information for defenders' matches
      tags:
        - Defenders
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A JSON array array of defenders' matcher
      servers:
        - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
    servers:
      - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
  /api/midfielders/rankings:
    get:
      description: JSON array of (key, value) pairs where the key is a playerid and the value is a json object with url specific information. A player-id parameter can be added to retrive a single record..
      tags:
        - Midfielders
      responses:
        '200':
          description: JSON array of (key, value) pairs where the key is a playerid and the value is a json object with url specific information. A player-id parameter can be added to retrive a single record..
      servers:
        - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
    servers:
      - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
  /api/midfielders/shots/info:
    get:
      description: JSON array of (key, value) pairs where the key is a playerid and the value is a json object with url specific information. A player-id parameter can be added to retrive a single record..
      tags:
        - Midfielders
      responses:
        '200':
          description: JSON array of (key, value) pairs where the key is a playerid and the value is a json object with url specific information. A player-id parameter can be added to retrive a single record..
      servers:
        - url: 'http://footyphi.com'
    servers:

    get:
      description: JSON array of (key, value) pairs where the key is a playerid and the value is a json object with url specific information. A player-id parameter can be added to retrive a single record..
      tags:
